des: "My late step-father used to make this, and it is the best I've ever tasted! It is good for chicken, steak or venison. Making this brings back warm memories."
ins: In a medium bowl, mix distilled white vinegar, Worcestershire sauce, soy sauce, hot pepper sauce, barbeque sauce and ketchup. Place desired meat in the marinade, and marinate in the refrigerator at least 1/2 hour before grilling as desired.
